text: I went through all of GameStops options transactions for this entire month I told you guys I do this option stuff and I got a couple questions asking about some other expiration cycles and Strikes based on the video I did yesterday and I'm always here to look into some details so yesterday's video was really analyzing whether or not I thought roaring Kitty was buying calls the cliff notes to that version is at least so far I'm not seeing it and that's not to say that he couldn't be doing it but it would be completely different than what he's done before what that means is based on the updates he was sharing on his portfolio previously leading up to the 10th of June I essentially looked at his strike price around his size of a position and I analyze the transaction history so I can get a sense of size latency frequency all those kinds of things it kind of creates like a bit of a a fingerprint on an individual Trad Behavior especially when you're trading something at size it's a little easier to detect so a lot of the things we're seeing so far don't really live up to that standard in so far as most of the transactions the block transactions we're seeing are still pretty small and I'm not seeing the same behavior as I did before so the goal of this video is to provide an update on GameStop options cuz as
